content:
I don't have up-to-date information to answer your question regarding any specific projects or initiatives johnson & johnson is involved in related to climate change. however, i can provide some information based on what i currently have.

johnson & johnson is involved in several specific projects and initiatives related to climate change. for example, the company has launched various initiatives to reduce greenhouse gas emissions from its own operations, such as increasing the use of clean energy sources and improving energy efficiency. johnson & johnson is also working to reduce the environmental impact of its products and supply chain, by investing in sustainable sourcing and reducing packaging waste.

moreover, the company has established partnerships with numerous organizations and institutions to accelerate progress on climate change mitigation and adaptation. johnson & johnson is a signatory to the united nations global compact, which is committed to promoting sustainability and addressing global sustainability challenges. the company has also collaborated with the world resources institute (wri) to develop climate goals and strategies to reduce its carbon footprint.

these are some examples of johnson & johnson's involvement in specific initiatives and projects related to climate change.
